title: Skipped fajr due to menstrual cramps, am I sinful? Should I make up the prayer? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: Mira from Georgia cramps before the period She skipped fer and after she woke up 10 or 11:00 there was no discharge there was no Menses but while answering the call of nature her menes started so is she sinful the answer is yes you should not stop praying just because you have cramps or color discharge only stop praying when the flow of the blood begins and she says do I have to repeat the f after my menes is over and I take the answer is yes was
